verses.text: Now there was a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abiel|strong="H0022"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeror|strong="H6872"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bechorath|strong="H1064"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aphiah|strong="H0647"\w*, a \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w*, a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w power|strong="H2428"\w*.\f + \fr 9.1 \ft a Benjamite: or, the son of a man of Jemini\f*\f + \fr 9.1 \ft power: or, substance\f*

And he had a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, a choice young \w man|strong="H0970"\w*, and a \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w*: and \add there was\add* not among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w goodlier|strong="H2896"\w* \w person|strong="H0376"\w* than he: from his \w shoulders|strong="H7926"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* \add he was\add* \w higher|strong="H1364"\w* than any of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \w Saul’s|strong="H7586"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* were \w lost|strong="H0006"\w*. And \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* now \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* with thee, and \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w*.

And he passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Shalisha|strong="H8031"\w*, but they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add them\add* not: then they passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Shalim|strong="H8171"\w*, and \add there they were\add* not: and he passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w*, but they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add them\add* not.

\add And\add* when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Zuph|strong="H6689"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* that \add was\add* with him, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w return|strong="H7725"\w*; lest my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w leave|strong="H2308"\w* \add caring\add* for the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w*, and take \w thought|strong="H1672"\w* for us.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Behold now, \add there is\add* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \add he is\add* an \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*; all that he \w saith|strong="H1696"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* surely to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*: now let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* thither; peradventure he can \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* us our \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that we should \w go|strong="H1980"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, But, behold, \add if\add* we \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, what shall we \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*? for the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* is \w spent|strong="H0235"\w* in our \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \add there is\add* not a \w present|strong="H8670"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: what have we?\f + \fr 9.7 \ft is spent…: Heb. is gone out of, etc\f*\f + \fr 9.7 \ft have we: Heb. is with us?\f*

And the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w again|strong="H3254"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \w have|strong="H4672"\w* here at \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the fourth \w part|strong="H7253"\w* of a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*: \add that\add* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* us our \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 9.8 \ft I have…: Heb. there is found in my hand\f*

(\w Beforetime|strong="H6440"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thus he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w seer|strong="H7200"\w*: for \add he that is\add* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \add called\add* a \w Prophet|strong="H5030"\w* was \w beforetime|strong="H6440"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* a \w Seer|strong="H7200"\w*.)

Then \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, \w Well|strong="H2896"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*; \w come|strong="H3212"\w*, let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w*. So they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* unto the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* where the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add was\add*.\f + \fr 9.10 \ft Well said: Heb. Thy word is good\f*

¶ \add And\add* as they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w hill|strong="H4608"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* young \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w* going \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w draw|strong="H7579"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Is|strong="H3426"\w* the \w seer|strong="H7200"\w* here?\f + \fr 9.11 \ft the hill…: Heb. in the ascent of the city\f*

And they \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He \w is|strong="H3426"\w*; behold, \add he is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you: make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* now, for he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; for \add there is\add* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*:\f + \fr 9.12 \ft sacrifice: or, feast\f*

As soon as ye be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, ye shall \w straightway|strong="H3651"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* him, before he go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* will not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* until he \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, because he doth \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*; \add and\add* \w afterwards|strong="H0310"\w* they \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* that be \w bidden|strong="H7121"\w*. Now therefore get you \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for about this \w time|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* him.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft this time: Heb. to day\f*

And they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \add and\add* when they were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, behold, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* them, for to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*.

¶ Now the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w told|strong="H1540"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* in his \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 9.15 \ft told…: Heb. revealed the ear of Samuel\f*

To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* about this \w time|strong="H6256"\w* I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* thee a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and thou shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* him \add to be\add* \w captain|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that he may \w save|strong="H3467"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: for I have \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* upon my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, because their \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me.

And when \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* unto him, Behold the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* whom I \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to thee of! this same shall \w reign|strong="H6113"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft reign over: Heb. restrain in\f*

Then \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* drew \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* me, I pray thee, \w where|strong="H0335"\w* the \w seer’s|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add is\add*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* the \w seer|strong="H7200"\w*: go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me unto the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*; for ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* with me to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and to \w morrow|strong="H1242"\w* I will let thee \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and will \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee all that \add is\add* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

And as for thine \w asses|strong="H0860"\w* that were \w lost|strong="H0006"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w ago|strong="H3117"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* not thy \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* on them; for they are \w found|strong="H4672"\w*. And on whom \add is\add* all the \w desire|strong="H2532"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \add Is it\add* not on thee, and on all thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*?\f + \fr 9.20 \ft three…: Heb. to day three days\f*

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Am\add* not I a \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w*, of the \w smallest|strong="H6996"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? and my \w family|strong="H4940"\w* the \w least|strong="H6810"\w* of all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*? wherefore then \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* thou \w so|strong="H1697"\w* to me?\f + \fr 9.21 \ft so…: Heb. according to this word\f*

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them into the \w parlour|strong="H3957"\w*, and made them \w sit|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w chiefest|strong="H7218"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* among them that were \w bidden|strong="H7121"\w*, which \add were\add* about \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w persons|strong="H0376"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w cook|strong="H2876"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H5414"\w* the \w portion|strong="H4490"\w* which I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee, of which I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, \w Set|strong="H7760"\w* it by thee.

And the \w cook|strong="H2876"\w* took \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w*, and \add that\add* which \add was\add* upon it, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. And \add Samuel\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold that which is \w left|strong="H7604"\w*! \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \add and\add* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: for unto this \w time|strong="H4150"\w* hath it been \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* for thee since I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. So \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* with \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 9.24 \ft left: or, reserved\f*

¶ And when they were come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add Samuel\add* \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* upon the top of the \w house|strong="H1406"\w*.

And they arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w*: and it came to pass about the \w spring|strong="H5927"\w* of the \w day|strong="H7837"\w*, that \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* to the top of the \w house|strong="H1406"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Up|strong="H6965"\w*, that I may send thee \w away|strong="H7971"\w*. And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them, he and \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*.

\add And\add* as they were going \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w Bid|strong="H0559"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* pass \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, (and he passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w*,) but \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* thou still a \w while|strong="H3117"\w*, that I may \w shew|strong="H8085"\w* thee the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 9.27 \ft a while: Heb. to day\f*
